widget.name: Dynamic Bottomsheet
widget.description: A Widget to build an height dynamic bottomsheet

property.caption: Content Text
property.description: The text displayed inside the bottom sheet.

property.caption: Maximum Height
property.description: The maximum height of the bottom sheet in pixels. Defaults to 75% of the screen height.

property.caption: Enable Over Drag
property.description: Whether to allow over-dragging of the bottom sheet.

property.caption: Enable Pan Down to Close
property.description: Whether swiping down closes the bottom sheet.

property.caption: Enable Dynamic Sizing
property.description: Whether to allow dynamic sizing of the bottom sheet based on its content.

property.caption: Show Vertical Scroll Indicator
property.description: Whether to display a vertical scroll indicator in the bottom sheet.
